duck: Lethal (UTFO album), a 1987 release from the hip-hop group UTFO
Leigh Matthews (born 1952), Australian rules footballer nicknamed "Lethal" or "Lethal" Leigh
lethal definition: of, relating to, or causing death.
Lethal (album), a 1990 album by the Cockney Rejects
Lethality, the capability of causing death - Lethality or deadliness is how capable something is of causing death.
Jay Lethal (born 1985), ring name of American professional wrestler Jamar Shipman

milestones: Lethal explosions hit Bali
Final US manufacturer ceases production of lethal injection drug; executions delayed
UK to ban export of lethal injection drugs to US
U.S. Supreme Court hears arguments on constitutionality of lethal injection
US military developing non-lethal pain weapon
Washington, D.C. sniper John Allen Muhammad executed by lethal injection
Lethal earthquakes rock western Iran, 70 or more die
US Air Force chief proposes using non-lethal military weapons domestically
No reprieve for Stanley Williams, Crips street gang founder
Czech Republic coast to 3-0 win over USA in Group E
H5N1 confirmed in France
Major new bird flu outbreaks reported in Asia
US, UK investigators seek 777 engine redesign to stop repeat of London jet crash
Boeing 777s to continue to fly with potentially lethal flaw
Indian lawyers debate how to execute Mohammad Afzal
All executions suspended in Florida after error
Condemned US killer to face execution by firing squad
US guards kill four in Iraqi prison riot
Nevada man's execution halted at 11th hour
Lord Falconer proposes bill to legalise assisted dying for terminal ill in UK
Michael Morales execution postponed indefinitely

wiki.text:
'Lethal' is an adjective meaning capable of causing death. It may also refer to:
* Lethality, the capability of causing death
* Lethal (band), an American heavy metal band
* Leigh Matthews (born 1952), Australian rules footballer nicknamed "Lethal" or
  "Lethal" Leigh
* Jay Lethal (born 1985), ring name of American professional wrestler
  Jamar Shipman
* ''Lethal'' (film), a 2005 action film starring Heather Marie Marsden and
  Lorenzo Lamas
* ''Lethal'' (album), a 1990 album by the Cockney Rejects
* ''Lethal'' (UTFO album), a 1987 release from the hip-hop group UTFO
* DJ Lethal (born 1972), turntablist and producer
wiki.title: lethal
